paragraph: By checking the boxes, you accept the Privacy Policy
Currently, you are not waiting for any notifications.
Due to this option, you can log out from our website and application on all browsers and devices at once - also the account that you are using right now.
If you click on this button, you will delete your account in  store. Make sure you definitely want to do this - your account cannot    be restored.
paragraph_2: If you want to keep your account, but don't want to get messages from us - uncheck the consents in the notification settings.
